tags.name: Users
tags.description: Operations related to user authentication, profile, and management.

tags.name: Reports
tags.description: Operations for user reports and management.

tags.name: Wallets
tags.description: Operations related to user wallets and transactions.

tags.name: Ratings
tags.description: Operations for managing ratings and feedback.

tags.name: Dashboard
tags.description: Public statistics for the dashboard/landing page.

post.description: Creates a new user account, sends a verification email, and returns access/refresh tokens.
Authenticates a user with email and password, returning access and refresh tokens.
Invalidates the provided refresh token, effectively logging the user out. Requires a valid access token for authentication.
Sends a forgot password token to the user's email if the email exists.
Checks if the provided forgot password token is valid.
Sets a new password for the user using a valid email and OTP.
Verifies a user's email with the provided OTP.

200.description: Email verification status. Can be a success message or a new set of tokens.

post.description: Resends a new email verification token to the authenticated user's email.

403.description: Forbidden (user is banned or already verified).

put.description: Allows an authenticated and verified user to change their password by providing the old and new password.

401.description: Unauthorized (invalid access token or old password does not match).

403.description: Forbidden (user is not verified).

get.description: Retrieves the profile information of the currently authenticated user.

patch.description: Partially updates the profile information of the authenticated user. Only include the fields to be changed.

post.description: Issues a new access token and refresh token in exchange for a valid refresh token.

401.description: Unauthorized (refresh token is invalid, used, or non-existent).

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all users. This endpoint is accessible only by Admin and Staff.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Filter users by role.

parameters.name: verify
parameters.description: Filter users by verification status.

200.description: A paginated list of users retrieved successfully.

403.description: Forbidden. User does not have Admin or Staff rights.

422.description: Validation error (e.g., invalid role or verify status).

get.summary: Search users by email or phone (Admin/Staff only)
get.description: Searches for users by matching email or phone number. Requires Admin or Staff privileges.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query (full or partial email or phone number).

200.description: Search successful. Returns a list of matching users.

message.example: Search users successfully

403.description: Forbidden. User does not have Admin or Staff rights.

422.description: Validation error (e.g., search query 'q' is missing).

get.summary: Get user detail by ID (Admin/Staff only)
get.description: Retrieves the full profile information of a specific user by their ID. Requires Admin or Staff privileges.

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to retrieve.

message.example: Lấy thông tin chi tiết người dùng thành công

403.description: Forbidden (User does not have Admin or Staff rights).

404.description: User not found (either the user from the token or the user specified by _id).

patch.description:
Partially updates a user's profile. Requires Admin or Staff privileges.
- Only fields included in the request body will be updated.
- **Important**: If the 'email' field is changed, the user's 'verify' status will be automatically reset to 'UNVERIFIED' and a new verification OTP will be sent to the new email.

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to update.

requestBody.description: A JSON object containing the fields to update. All fields are optional.

message.example: Cập nhật thông tin người dùng thành công

403.description: Forbidden (User does not have Admin or Staff rights).

404.description: User not found (either the user from the token or the user specified by _id).

422.description: Validation error (e.g., email/username/phone/nfc already exists, invalid format).

post.description: Allows an Admin to forcibly set a new password for any user. This action is irreversible.

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the user whose password will be reset.

message.example: Đặt lại mật khẩu thành công

403.description: Forbidden (User is not an Admin).

422.description: Validation error (e.g., passwords do not match, password not strong enough).

get.description: Retrieves statistics about the user base (total, verified, unverified, banned). Requires Admin or Staff privileges.

message.example: Lấy thống kê người dùng thành công

403.description: Forbidden (User does not have Admin or Staff rights).

404.description: User not found (user from token does not exist).

get.description:
Retrieves a timeseries of active user counts, grouped by day or month.
Active users are defined as users who have had token activity (login/refresh).
Requires Admin or Staff privileges.

parameters.name: groupBy
parameters.description: Group the statistics by 'day' or 'month'.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date of the period (YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date of the period (YYYY-MM-DD). Must be after or the same as startDate.

message.example: Lấy thống kê người dùng hoạt động thành công

422.description: Validation error (e.g., missing params, invalid groupBy, endDate before startDate).

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of users with the most completed rentals. Requires Admin or Staff privileges.

422.description: Validation error (e.g., page or limit is not a number).

post.description: Allows an Admin to create a new user account (e.g., a Staff account). A wallet is automatically created for the new user. The account is set to 'VERIFIED' by default unless specified otherwise.

message.example: Tạo người dùng thành công

403.description: Forbidden (User is not an Admin).

422.description: Validation error (e.g., email/phone already exists, invalid role, weak password).

get.summary: Get new user registration stats (Admin only)
get.description:
Retrieves statistics on new user registrations.
Compares Month-to-Date (MTD) registrations of this month against the same period last month.
**Requires Admin privileges (not Staff).**

message.example: Lấy thống kê người dùng mới thành công

403.description: Forbidden (User is not an Admin).

404.description: User not found (Admin user from token does not exist).

get.description:
Retrieves key statistics about the user base for the Admin dashboard.
Includes total customers, active customers, new customers this month, total revenue, average spending, and the top renter (VIP).
**Requires Admin privileges (not Staff).**

message.example: Lấy thống kê dashboard người dùng thành công

403.description: Forbidden (User is not an Admin).

404.description: User not found (Admin user from token does not exist).

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of bikes. Filter bikes by status, chip_id, station_id, and supplier_id.

parameters.name: station_id
parameters.description: Filter bikes by station ID.

parameters.name: supplier_id
parameters.description: Filter bikes by supplier ID.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter bikes by status. (Admin/Staff only for non-available statuses)

parameters.name: chip_id
parameters.description: Filter bikes by chip ID.

post.description: Adds a new bike to the system. Requires admin privileges.

message.example: Create bike successfully

patch.description: Allows a user to report a bike they are currently renting as broken.

403.description: Forbidden, user is not renting this bike.

get.summary: Get rental history for a bike (Admin/Staff only)

200.description: A paginated list of rentals for the bike.

get.summary: Get statistics for a specific bike (Admin only)

get.description:
Retrieves a paginated history of **completed** rental sessions for a specific bike.
Requires Admin or Staff privileges.

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the bike to get history for.

403.description: Forbidden. User does not have Admin or Staff rights.

404.description: Bike not found or Admin/Staff user not found.

422.description: Validation error (e.g., invalid page or limit).

get.description:
Retrieves detailed activity statistics for a specific bike, including total usage, reports, estimated uptime, and monthly performance.
Requires Admin or Staff privileges.

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the bike to get statistics for.

message.example: Lấy thống kê hoạt động của xe thành công

403.description: Forbidden. User does not have Admin or Staff rights.

404.description: Bike not found or Admin/Staff user not found.

get.description:
Retrieves the total number of active bikes (excluding unavailable ones), the number of currently rented bikes, and the percentage of rented bikes.
**Requires Admin privileges (not Staff).**

message.example: Lấy thống kê tổng quan thuê xe thành công

403.description: Forbidden. User is not an Admin.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all suppliers. Requires admin privileges.

post.description: Adds a new supplier to the system. Requires admin privileges.

get.summary: Get bike statistics for all suppliers (Admin only)
get.description: Retrieves statistics about the number of bikes associated with each supplier. Requires admin privileges.
Retrieves detailed information for a specific supplier by their ID. Requires admin privileges.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the supplier to retrieve.

put.description: Updates the information of an existing supplier. Requires admin privileges.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the supplier to update.

patch.description: Changes the status of a supplier (e.g., ACTIVE, INACTIVE). Requires admin privileges.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the supplier whose status is to be changed.

get.summary: Get bike statistics for a specific supplier (Admin only)
get.description: Retrieves statistics about the number of bikes for a specific supplier by their ID. Requires admin privileges.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the supplier to get statistics for.

post.description: Allows a user to start a new rental session by providing a bike ID.

400.description: Bad Request (e.g., bike not available, station not found).

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all rental sessions.
Retrieves the authenticated user's paginated rental history.

200.description: A paginated list of the user's rentals.
Details of the current active rental session.

get.summary: Get details of my specific rental

200.description: Detailed information about the rental session.

403.description: Forbidden (trying to access another user's rental).

put.description: Allows a user to end their own currently active rental session.

403.description: Forbidden (not the user's rental).

404.description: Not Found (rental is not currently active).

get.summary: Get rental details by ID (Admin only)

400.description: Bad Request (e.g., rental cannot be cancelled in its current state).

post.description: Allows a user to create a reservation for a bike.

400.description: Bad Request (e.g., bike not available, user already has reservation).

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all reservations.
Retrieves a paginated list of the authenticated user's reservations.

200.description: A paginated list of the user's reservations.

403.description: Forbidden (not the user's reservation).

post.description: Allows a user to cancel their own reservation.

403.description: Forbidden (not the user's reservation).

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of reports created by the currently authenticated user.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter reports by status.

200.description: A paginated list of user's reports.

post.description: Submits a new report. For reports involving files, use `multipart/form-data`.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all reports in the system. Requires admin privileges.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter reports by type.

parameters.name: userID
parameters.description: Filter reports by user ID.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Filter reports by a specific date (YYYY-MM-DD).

200.description: A paginated list of all reports.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific report by its ID.

parameters.name: reportID
parameters.description: The ID of the report to retrieve.

put.description: Updates the status, assignee, or priority of a report. Requires admin/staff privileges.

parameters.name: reportID
parameters.description: The ID of the report to update.

get.description: Retrieves information about the currently authenticated user's wallet.
Retrieves a paginated list of transactions for the authenticated user's wallet.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter transactions by type.

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific transaction for the authenticated user.

put.description: Increases the balance of a user's wallet. Requires admin privileges.
Decreases the balance of a user's wallet. Requires admin privileges.

patch.description: Changes the status of a user's wallet (e.g., Active, Frozen). Requires admin privileges.

post.description: Allows an authenticated user to submit a refund request for a specific transaction.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of refund requests for the currently authenticated user.

200.description: A paginated list of the user's refund requests.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all refund requests. Requires admin privileges.

200.description: A paginated list of all refund requests.

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific refund request. Admins can view any request, users can only view their own.

put.description: Allows an admin to approve, reject, or complete a refund request.

post.description: Allows an authenticated user to submit a request to withdraw funds from their wallet.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of the authenticated user's withdrawal requests.

200.description: A paginated list of withdrawal requests.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all withdrawal requests in the system.

200.description: A paginated list of all withdrawal requests.

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific withdrawal request. Admins can view any request, users can only view their own.

put.description: Allows an admin to approve, reject, or complete a withdrawal request.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all bike stations. This is a public endpoint.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter stations by name (case-insensitive, partial match).

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Filter stations by address (case-insensitive, partial match).

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Filter stations by latitude.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Filter stations by longitude.

parameters.name: capacity
parameters.description: Filter stations by capacity (exact match).

post.description: Adds a new bike station to the system. Requires admin privileges.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific station by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the station to retrieve.

put.description: Updates the information of an existing station. Requires admin privileges.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the station to update.

delete.description: Deletes a station from the system. Requires admin privileges.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the station to delete.

get.description: Finds and returns a list of stations near a given geographical coordinate.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: The latitude of the location to search from.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: The longitude of the location to search from.

parameters.name: maxDistance
parameters.description: Maximum distance in meters. (Default: 1000m)

422.description: Validation error (e.g., latitude/longitude is not numeric or is missing).

get.description:
Retrieves a paginated list of rentals associated with a specific station. 
- Requires Admin or Staff privileges.
- Can be used to filter by status (e.g., 'ĐANG THUÊ').
- **Special Feature**: If `status` is set to 'ĐÃ ĐẶT TRƯỚC', you can use `expired_within` to find reservations expiring soon.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the station to check.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter rentals by status.

parameters.name: expired_within
parameters.description: Only used if status='ĐÃ ĐẶT TRƯỚC'. Finds reservations expiring within this many minutes. (Default: 60)

200.description: A paginated list of rentals for the station, with populated bike info.

timeRemainingMinutes.description: Minutes remaining until the reservation expires (only for 'ĐÃ ĐẶT TRƯỚC' status).

403.description: Forbidden (User does not have Admin or Staff rights).

get.summary: Get detailed statistics for a specific station (Admin only)
get.description:
Retrieves detailed statistics for a specific station within a given time period (defaults to 2025-01-01 to now if unspecified).
Includes rental activity originating from the station, return activity, current bike status, reports, and utilization rate.
**Requires Admin privileges.**

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the station to get statistics for.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start date for the statistics period (YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to '2025-01-01'.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End date for the statistics period (YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to the current date.

message.example: Lấy thống kê trạm thành công

403.description: Forbidden. User is not an Admin.

404.description: Station not found or Admin user not found.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of ratings submitted by the currently authenticated user.

200.description: A paginated list of the user's ratings.

post.summary: Create a new rating for a rental
post.description: Allows a user to submit a rating (score and comment) for a completed rental session.

parameters.name: rentalId
parameters.description: The ID of the rental session to be rated.

400.description: Bad Request (e.g., rental already rated, rental not completed).

403.description: Forbidden (user did not rent this bike).

get.description: Retrieves the rating associated with a specific rental ID.

parameters.name: rentalId
parameters.description: The ID of the rental session.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all ratings for a specific bike. (Public endpoint)

parameters.name: bikeId
parameters.description: The ID of the bike.

200.description: A paginated list of ratings for the bike.

get.description:
Retrieves general statistics for the landing page. This is a public endpoint and does not require authentication.
- **totalStations**: Total count of all stations.
- **totalBikes**: Count of all bikes *except* those marked 'KHÔNG CÓ SẴN'.
- **totalUsers**: Count of all users *except* those marked 'BANNED'.

message.example: Lấy thống kê dashboard thành công

500.description: Internal server error while fetching stats.

message.example: Lỗi khi lấy thống kê dashboard

get.summary: Get all stations with available bike counts
get.description:
Retrieves a list of all stations along with the count of *available* bikes at each one.
This is a public endpoint and does not require authentication.

200.description: List of stations and their available bike counts retrieved successfully.

500.description: Internal server error while fetching stations.

message.example: Error fetching stations

phone_number.description: Số điện thoại người dùng (10 số, theo định dạng Việt Nam)

refresh_token.description: The refresh token issued to the user during login, which will be invalidated upon logout.

ResetPasswordReqBody.description: Đặt lại mật khẩu bằng email và mã OTP.

otp.description: Mã OTP 6 số được gửi qua email
Mã OTP 6 số được gửi qua email

password.description: The user's new password (must be strong).

UpdateMeReqBody.description: Fields to update for the user's profile. All fields are optional.

username.description: A new unique username for the user. Must not be already taken by another user.

avatar.description: A URL pointing to the user's new avatar image.

phone_number.description: Số điện thoại mới của người dùng (10 số, Việt Nam)

refresh_token.description: The valid refresh token that was provided upon login.

station_id.description: The ID of the station to which the bike belongs.

chip_id.description: The unique identifier of the bike's chip.

UpdateBikeReqBody.description: Fields to update for a bike. All fields are optional.

chip_id.description: The new unique identifier for the bike's chip.

station_id.description: The new station ID for the bike.

supplier_id.description: The new supplier ID for the bike.

name.example: Công ty TNHH Xe Đạp Toàn Cầu

phone_number.description: Phone number of the supplier (must be 10 digits).

contract_fee.description: Contract fee with up to 2 decimal places.

UpdateSupplierReqBody.description: Fields to update for a supplier. All fields are optional.

name.example: Công ty Cổ phần Xe Đạp Việt Nam

phone_number.description: New phone number for the supplier (must be 10 digits).

newStatus.description: The new status for the supplier.

bike_id.description: The ID of the bike to be rented.

end_station.description: The ID of the station where the bike was returned. Optional.

end_time.description: The time the rental ended. Optional.

total_price.description: The total price of the rental. Optional.

reason.example: Admin adjusted rental details due to system error.

bikeStatus.description: The new status to set for the bike after cancellation (e.g., 'AVAILABLE', 'BROKEN'). Optional.

reason.description: The reason for cancelling the rental.
reason.example: Customer requested cancellation due to personal emergency.

end_station.description: The ID of the station where the bike is being returned.

end_time.description: The time the rental is being ended. Optional, defaults to current time.

reason.description: The reason for ending the rental session.
reason.example: Staff assisted user to end rental session.

bike_id.description: The ID of the bike to be reserved.

reason.description: The reason for cancelling the reservation.

message.example: The bike's front tire is flat.

bike_id.description: Required if type is 'XE HƯ HỎNG' or 'XE BẨN'.

rental_id.description: Optional, to link the report to a specific rental session.

files.description: Array of files (images/videos) to upload with the report.

staff_id.description: The ID of the staff member to assign the report to. Required when changing status to 'ĐANG XỬ LÝ'.

priority.description: The priority of the report. Required when changing status to 'ĐANG XỬ LÝ'.

transaction_id.description: The ID of the transaction for which the refund is requested.

amount.description: The amount to be refunded. Must be a positive number.

newStatus.description: The new status for the refund request. Allowed values are 'ĐÃ DUYỆT', 'TỪ CHỐI', 'ĐÃ HOÀN THÀNH'.

message.example: Top-up successful
Adjustment successful

reason.description: Reason is required if status is 'TỪ CHỐI'.
reason.example: Thông tin tài khoản không hợp lệ.

address.example: 161 Xa lộ Hà Nội, Thảo Điền, TP. Thủ Đức

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the station.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the station.

capacity.description: The maximum number of bikes the station can hold.

UpdateStationReqBody.description: Fields to update for a station. All fields are optional.

name.description: The new name for the station.
name.example: Trạm Vincom Mega Mall Thảo Điền

address.description: The new address for the station.

capacity.description: The new capacity for the station.

comment.description: An optional comment for the rating.
comment.example: Xe đạp còn mới, chạy tốt.

UpdateUserReqBody.description: Fields to update for the user's profile. All fields are optional. If 'email' is changed, 'verify' status will be reset to 'UNVERIFIED'.

email.description: The user's new email. Must be unique.

username.description: The user's new username. Must be unique.

phone_number.description: The user's new phone number (10 digits). Must be unique.

nfc_card_uid.description: The user's NFC card UID. Must be unique. Send null or empty string to remove.

fullname.description: Full name of the new user.

email.description: Email of the new user. Must be unique.

password.description: Password for the new user (8-30 characters).

phone_number.description: Phone number of the new user (10 digits). Must be unique.

role.description: Role to assign to the new user.

verify.description: Verification status. If omitted, defaults to 'VERIFIED'.

message.example: Login successful
Register successful

Refresh token successful

capacity.description: The maximum number of bikes the station can hold.

bikes.description: A list of bike IDs currently at the station.

StationStatus.description: The operational status of a station.

Rating.description: Represents a user's rating for a rental.

total_users.description: Total number of all user accounts.

ActiveUserStatItem.description: Một điểm dữ liệu trong chuỗi thời gian thống kê người dùng hoạt động.

date.description: Ngày hoặc tháng cho điểm dữ liệu (YYYY-MM-DD hoặc YYYY-MM).

active_users_count.description: Số lượng người dùng hoạt động duy nhất trong kỳ đó.

TopRenterStatItem.description: Thông tin thống kê của một người dùng thuê xe hàng đầu.

total_rentals.description: Tổng số lượt thuê đã hoàn thành của người dùng.

user.description: Thông tin cơ bản của người dùng.

NewUserStats.description: Thống kê so sánh lượng người dùng (Role: User) đăng ký mới trong tháng này so với cùng kỳ tháng trước.

newUsersThisMonth.description: Số lượng người dùng mới đăng ký từ đầu tháng này đến hôm nay.

newUsersLastMonth.description: Số lượng người dùng mới đăng ký từ đầu tháng trước đến ngày tương ứng của tháng trước.

percentageChange.description: Phần trăm thay đổi (tăng/giảm) so với tháng trước.

BikeRentalHistoryItem.description: Một bản ghi lịch sử thuê xe (đã hoàn thành) của một chiếc xe cụ thể.

user.description: Thông tin cơ bản của người thuê.

BikeActivityStatsMonthlyItem.description: Thống kê hoạt động của xe trong một tháng cụ thể.

rentals_count.description: Số lượt thuê đã hoàn thành trong tháng.

minutes_active.description: Tổng số phút hoạt động (từ các lượt thuê hoàn thành) trong tháng.

revenue.description: Tổng doanh thu từ các lượt thuê hoàn thành trong tháng.

BikeActivityStats.description: Thống kê hoạt động tổng hợp của một chiếc xe.

total_minutes_active.description: Tổng số phút hoạt động từ tất cả các lượt thuê đã hoàn thành.

total_reports.description: Tổng số lần xe được báo cáo là Hư Hỏng hoặc Bẩn.

uptime_percentage.description: Tỷ lệ phần trăm thời gian hoạt động ước tính (tỷ lệ giữa tổng phút hoạt động thực tế và tổng thời gian có thể hoạt động kể từ khi tạo).

monthly_stats.description: Thống kê hoạt động theo tháng (tối đa 12 tháng gần nhất).

StationStats.description: Thống kê chi tiết cho một trạm trong một khoảng thời gian.

from.description: Ngày bắt đầu của kỳ thống kê.

to.description: Ngày kết thúc của kỳ thống kê.

totalRentals.description: Tổng số lượt thuê bắt đầu từ trạm này (đã hoàn thành).

totalRevenue.description: Tổng doanh thu từ các lượt thuê đó.

totalDuration.description: Tổng thời lượng (phút) của các lượt thuê đó.

totalReturns.description: Tổng số lượt xe được trả về trạm này.

currentBikes.description: Thông tin về số lượng xe hiện tại ở trạm theo trạng thái.

totalBikes.description: Tổng số xe đang có mặt tại trạm.

available.description: Số xe có trạng thái 'CÓ SẴN'.

booked.description: Số xe có trạng thái 'ĐANG ĐƯỢC THUÊ' (thường là 0 nếu đang ở trạm).

broken.description: Số xe có trạng thái 'BỊ HỎNG'.

reserved.description: Số xe có trạng thái 'ĐÃ ĐẶT TRƯỚC'.

maintained.description: Số xe có trạng thái 'ĐANG BẢO TRÌ'.

unavailable.description: Số xe có trạng thái 'KHÔNG CÓ SẴN'.

emptySlots.description: Số chỗ trống còn lại tại trạm.

reports.description: Thống kê báo cáo liên quan đến trạm.

totalReports.description: Tổng số báo cáo liên quan đến trạm trong kỳ.

byType.description: Số lượng báo cáo theo từng loại.

utilization.description: Tỷ lệ sử dụng trạm (dựa trên thời gian hoạt động của xe).

rate.description: Tỷ lệ sử dụng (%) = (Tổng phút xe hoạt động / Tổng phút xe có thể hoạt động) * 100.

availableMinutes.description: Tổng số phút xe có thể hoạt động trong kỳ (Số xe * Số phút trong kỳ).

usedMinutes.description: Tổng số phút xe thực tế hoạt động (từ rentals.totalDuration).

BikeRentalOverviewStats.description: Thống kê tổng quan về số lượng xe đang hoạt động và đang được thuê.

total_active_bikes.description: Tổng số xe đang hoạt động (không bao gồm xe có trạng thái 'KHÔNG CÓ SẴN').

rented_bikes.description: Số lượng xe đang có trạng thái 'ĐANG ĐƯỢC THUÊ'.

percentage.description: Tỷ lệ phần trăm xe đang được thuê so với tổng số xe đang hoạt động.

DashboardStats.description: Thống kê tổng quan cho trang chủ (landing page).

totalBikes.description: Tổng số xe đạp đang hoạt động (không bao gồm xe có trạng thái 'KHÔNG CÓ SẴN').

totalUsers.description: Tổng số người dùng đang hoạt động (không bao gồm người dùng 'BANNED').

DashboardStation.description: Thông tin cơ bản của trạm và số lượng xe đạp có sẵn cho dashboard.

address.example: 161 Xa lộ Hà Nội, Thảo Điền

availableBikes.description: Số lượng xe đạp hiện có sẵn tại trạm.

VipCustomerStat.description: Thông tin về khách hàng VIP (người có tổng thời gian thuê cao nhất). Trả về null nếu chưa có ai thuê.

fullname.description: Tên đầy đủ của khách hàng VIP.

totalDuration.description: Tổng số phút đã thuê của khách hàng VIP.

AdminUserDashboardStats.description: Thống kê tổng quan về người dùng cho trang dashboard của Admin.

activeCustomers.description: Số lượng khách hàng đang hoạt động (Đã xác thực).

newCustomersThisMonth.description: Số lượng khách hàng mới đăng ký trong tháng này.

totalRevenue.description: Tổng doanh thu từ tất cả các lượt thuê đã hoàn thành.

averageSpending.description: Chi tiêu trung bình trên mỗi khách hàng (Tổng doanh thu / Tổng khách hàng).

BearerAuth.description: Enter JWT access token in the format: Bearer <token>

LimitQuery.name: limit
LimitQuery.description: The number of items to return per page.
